GET /api.description: responds with a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api with additional information on each

GET /api/topics.description: responds with an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: responds with an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with the article object with the corresponding article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with the comments from a specific article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts the comment provided into the database and responds with the inserted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: adds the number of votes provided in the body to the specified article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: responds with an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the specified comment and responds with no content
